title: Delicious Swirly Typeface
content:
Can anyone name this swirly font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141104102807im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Wedding_Announcement_sml_5077.jpg)
author: aaronjpou

comments.content:
Burgues Script using a few of the script's alternates.

Beautiful font, isn't it?  
--  
Dave Ward Photography
